forecast.day_comments: Snow likely, mainly before 2am.  Mostly cloudy, with a steady temperature around 22. Calm wind.  Chance of precipitation is 70%. Total nighttime snow accumulation of 1 to 2 inches possible.
forecast.night_comments: A 50 percent chance of snow.  Partly sunny, with a high near 24. North wind 3 to 6 mph.  New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible.
